citations.desc: ACCESS AND INSPECTION OF RECORDS AND PROPERTY; SUBMISSION OF ITINERARIES.
citations.narrative:
A responsible adult was not available to accompany APHIS Officials during the inspection process at 12:45-1:45 pm
on 08-AUG-17.
Inspectors arrived at 12:50 pm to a locked gate. Inspector called out for licensee and called listed numbers and left
messages with no return call.
Additional Inspectors
Plumlee Konnie, Supervisory Animal Care Specialist

narrative:
2.126(b)                    REPEAT
ACCESS AND INSPECTION OF RECORDS AND PROPERTY; SUBMISSION OF ITINERARIES.
A responsible adult was not available to accompany APHIS Officials during the inspection process at 12:45-1:45 pm
on 08-AUG-17.
Inspectors arrived at 12:50 pm to a locked gate.  Inspector called out for licensee and called listed numbers and left
messages with no return call.
Additional Inspectors
Plumlee Konnie, Supervisory Animal Care Specialist
